text: Darya Dmitrievna Sagalova (; born December 14, 1985) is a Russian film and stage actress, and choreographer. == Career == Sagalova has appeared in theatrical productions and films since 2003. Famous role Sveta Bukina from TV series Happy Together (). == Personal life == On January 21, 2011 Darya married police officer Konstantin Maslennikov.Актриса Дарья Сагалова вышла замуж. LifeNews. In February 2011 it became known that the couple are expecting their first child. Their daughter was born on July 1, 2011.Актриса Дарья Сагалова родила дочку.
